the two blasts hit pika-hawk but he gets out of the way of dragoon. he starts kicking dragoon
--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> OOC: I assume by uses them he threw them at Dragoon.
> 
> ::Dragoon::
>        He takes off into the air his sleek wings supporting him incredibly 
> well.  He laughs as the charges land under him until the explosions singe his 
> feet.  "Ooh.  That wasn't very nice."  He fires two crossed arcs of energy 
> that were about as strong as one of his last blasts.  The arcs were just for 
> show.  He then flips his sword into his right hand.  (It's attached to his 
> forearm when not in use.)  He flies at Pika-Hawk behind the crossed blasts.
>
